definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: The new Air Force chiefs were talking about how awesome drones were.
sentences.chinese: 空军的新首长正在谈论无人驾驶飞机是多么厉害。

sentences.english: She can recite the long poem from the beginning to the end.
sentences.chinese: 她能把那首长诗从头到尾地背下来。

sentences.english: But Americans still want their commander-in-chief to take command.
sentences.chinese: 但是美国仍然希望他们的首长能担当大局。

sentences.english: The confederacy had no official head or chief executive officer .
sentences.chinese: 联盟没有一长制首长，即没有主掌执行权的首脑。

sentences.english: Officiating guests and the Chamber's Chairmen kick-start the "CGCC Charity Walk" with a national flag.
sentences.chinese: “千万行”主礼嘉宾与本会首长在国旗引领下起步。

sentences.english: And the hand of the princes and magistrates hath been first in this transgression.
sentences.chinese: 尤其首长和官员，是这罪孽的魁首。

sentences.english: Want to be a provincial police chief?
sentences.chinese: 想成为一个省的警察首长吗？

sentences.english: He threw the ash over a peach tree, but not a single blossom appeared.
sentences.chinese: 那个坏心的人就洒了一些灰烬在首长心爱的桃树上。

sentences.english: They are "the eyes and ears" of the higher commanders.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是上级首长的“千里眼，顺风耳”。

sentences.english: A:How can you recite such a long poem without even one mistake?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么一字不错地背诵这首长诗的呢？

sentences.english: My chief tells me to respond for the United States Navy.
sentences.chinese: 我的首长让我代表美国海军致答辞。

sentences.english: The Chief Executive is the outstanding prominent member in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 行政特别区首长是杭州最出色及最重要的人。

sentences.english: But this plan also has obvious drawbacks.
sentences.chinese: 但行政首长负责制的缺点也是明显的。

sentences.english: As the chief administrative and technical officer of this Organization, I must accept personal responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 作为本组织的行政和技术首长，我必须承担个人责任。

sentences.english: This year we celebrated the Spring Festival in our permanent residential camps, and all the directors came to visit us.
sentences.chinese: 今年我们是在老营里过的年，首长们都来看望我们了。

sentences.english: He reported to his superiors and request had been granted.
sentences.chinese: 亚基莫维奇向上级首长报告，并得到了批准。

definition: Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
geographical area of command/(PLA) military district
